text:
HubHaus, REMOTE or ONSITE, $80-130K, Fullstack/Backend Developer

https://thehubhaus.com/careers/fullstack-developer

We're a modern solution to housing, creating community through coliving.

We don't have room or money for a cog in a wheel. You will own your area. We will provide you with the support, tools, training and anything else you need to fulfill your particular goals.

Apply with CV to kerry@thehubhaus.com
